definition: Asarum/Wild ginger/also 細辛|细辛[xi4 xin1]
Asarum/Wild ginger/also 細辛|细辛[xi4 xin1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The many people is all not that clear to this, including the university numerous students.
sentences.chinese: 很多人对此都不太清楚，包括大学莘莘学子。

sentences.english: The lecture attracted many students of South China University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 讲座吸引了华南理工大学的莘莘学子，座无虚席。

definition: to win top marks in the imperial examinations
to be successful in one's studies/academic success
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
gentleman aspiring to benevolence (idiom); people with lofty ideals

college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
